articles.author: Dan Wetzel
articles.title: Maligned compared to past editions, this USA men's basketball team is on the verge of winning gold all the same - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: How good are these Americans? "As good of a USA team as I've played against," according to the coach they just beat.
articles.content:
TOKYO Brian Hoorjian has coached Australia in three Olympics, including 2008 when they faced USA Basketball's so-called Redeem Team.

articles.title: Olympics: Carl Lewis slams US athletics men's relay team as 'total embarrassment' after semi failure - The Straits Times
articles.description: America's 4x100m squad finish a disappointing sixth and do not advance to the final.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: TOKYO (REUTERS) - The United States failed to make the Olympic men's 4x100 metres relay final after a ragged run saw them finish a shock sixth in their semi-final on Thursday (Aug 5), the latest in a… [+2332 chars]

articles.title: Delta Pushes Herd Immunity Threshold To Above 80%: Experts - NDTV
articles.description: The spread of the delta coronavirus variant has pushed the threshold for herd immunity to well over 80% and potentially approaching 90%, according to an Infectious Diseases Society of America briefing on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Nearly 60% of Americans have received at least one dose of a coronavirus vaccine
The spread of the delta coronavirus variant has pushed the threshold for herd immunity to well over 80% and potential… [+1067 chars]

articles.title: Canada wins historic silver in women’s C1 200m at Tokyo Olympics - CityNews Toronto
articles.description: Canada’s Laurence Vincent-Lapointe has won a historic silver medal in the women’s C1 200m sprint race at the Tokyo Olympics. The 29-year-old paddler from Trois-Rivieres, Que., finished the sprint in a time of 46.786 seconds, behind American Nevin Harrison. Uk…
articles.content:

articles.description: If more Americans don't get vaccinated against COVID-19, there is "ample chance" of another coronavirus variant emerging, Dr. Fauci warned Wednesday.
